https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/senio: BioMap is a platform company that integrates AI technology with cutting-edge biotechnology. We are committed to achieving breakthroughs in target discovery and drug design, and bringing global first-in-class medicine for unmet medical needs in the areas of immune-oncology, autoimmune diseases, fibrosis, and aging-related diseases.Location: Menlo Park.
